title: EntityActionFactory

EntityActionFactorylink

class EntityActionFactory { create<P = any>(nameOrPayload: string | EntityActionPayload<P>, entityOp?: EntityOp, data?: P, options?: EntityActionOptions): EntityAction<P> protected createCore<P = any>(payload: EntityActionPayload<P>) createFromAction<P = any>(from: EntityAction<any>, newProperties: Partial<EntityActionPayload<P>>): EntityAction<P> formatActionType(op: string, tag: string) }

Methodslink

create() link

mode_edit code

Create an EntityAction to perform an operation (op) for a particular entity type (entityName) with optional data and other optional flags

create<P = any>(entityName: string, entityOp: EntityOp, data?: P, options?: EntityActionOptions): EntityAction<P>

Parameters

entityName string

Name of the entity type
entityOp EntityOp

Operation to perform (EntityOp)
data P

data for the operation

Optional. Default is undefined.
options EntityActionOptions

additional options

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityAction<P>

Create an EntityAction to perform an operation (op) for a particular entity type (entityName) with optional data and other optional flags

create<P = any>(payload: EntityActionPayload<P>): EntityAction<P>

Parameters

payload EntityActionPayload<P>

Defines the EntityAction and its options

Returns

EntityAction<P>

createFromAction() link

mode_edit code

Create an EntityAction from another EntityAction, replacing properties with those from newPayload;
createFromAction<P = any>(from: EntityAction<any>, newProperties: Partial<EntityActionPayload<P>>): EntityAction<P>

Parameters

from EntityAction<any>

Source action that is the base for the new action
newProperties Partial<EntityActionPayload<P>>

New EntityAction properties that replace the source action properties

Returns

EntityAction<P>
